name: Freeze Techniques
description: Learn how to hold dynamic poses and freezes to punctuate breakdance sequences.

cards.title: Baby Freeze
cards.description: A foundational freeze where the body rests on one elbow for stability.
bulletpoints: Plant one elbow into your side for support
Lean forward and balance using your head
Keep legs tucked for better control

cards.title: Shoulder Freeze
cards.description: A more advanced pose where the body is balanced on one shoulder.
bulletpoints: Roll onto your shoulder and plant your arm for stability
Engage core muscles to hold position
Use opposite leg to balance and create a dynamic shape
